project.name: cayenne-parent: Top-level parent of Cayenne modules
project.description: Apache Cayenne is a powerful, full-featured, and open source Java framework, plus developer tools, that provides Object Relational Mapping (ORM) and remoting services for persistence. The software is licensed under the Apache License.
